column2: Testing approaches used Client-initiated testing and counselling
column3: Testing approaches used Provider-initiated testing and counselling
column4: Testing approaches used Routine antenatal testing
column5: Testing approaches used Community-based testing and counselling

column9: Testing approaches used Assisted partner notification/index testing
column11: Testing approaches used Social network-based testing
column12: Period(s) when retesting is done: During pregnancy
column13: Period(s) when retesting is done: At delivery
column14: Period(s) when retesting is done: Post-partum/breastfeeding
column15: Country adopted 2015 WHO guidelines recommendations on HIV testing services
column16: Country has a national policy on HIV self-testing
column17: Self-testing implemented (in countries with a national self-testing policy)
column18: Planned to include self-testing in national policy (countries where not already included)
column19: Assisted HIV partner notification included in national policy
column20: Planned to include assisted HIV partner notification in national policy (countries where not already included)
column21: Policy on HIV testing provision free to all, free to some or at a cost
column22: Law specifying HIV testing solely performed based on voluntary and informed consent
column23: Law specifying HIV testing is mandatory before marriage
column24: Law specifying HIV testing is mandatory to obtain a work or residence permit
column25: Law specifying HIV testing is mandatory for certain groups: National authorities
column26: Law specifying HIV testing is mandatory for certain groups: Civil society
column27: Country has a national policy/ strategy on linking HIV testing and counselling and enrolment in care
column28: Country adapted 2016 WHO consolidated guidelines recommendations: adult antiretroviral therapy
column29: National STI treatment guidelines or recommendations
column30: National strategy/action plan for STI prevention and control
column32: National definition for congenital syphilis includes stillbirths
column33: National strategy/policy guiding AIDS response
column34: National HIV strategy/policy reviewed in last 2 years
column35: National AIDS strategy/policy includes gender-transformative interventions
column36: National AIDS strategy/policy includes dedicated budget for gender transformative interventions
column37: Completeness of death reporting to civil registration and vital statistics system
column38: Deaths must be reported using a standard death report form that includes cause of death
column39: Individual-level data on reported deaths can be reported directly to the country's national HIV case reporting system
column40: Individual-level data on reported deaths can be linked to the country's national HIV case reporting system
column41: Country adapted 2018 WHO consolidated guidelines on ARV use for treating and preventing HIV infection
column42: Country adopted WHO 2017 recommendation on rapid initiation on ART
column43: Possible to start ART on the same day as HIV diagnosis
column44: Country adopted WHO 2017 recommendation to offer interventions for advanced HIV disease
column45: Implementation status of recommended interventions for advanced HIV disease
column46: Country has a policy on retesting HIV-negative women during pregnancy/delivery and/or the post-partum/breastfeeding period
column47: Travel-related mandatory HIV testing and HIV-related restrictions on entry, stay and residence (by group)
column48: Travel-related mandatory HIV testing and HIV-related restrictions on entry, stay and residence: HIV testing required for work permit
column49: Travel-related mandatory HIV testing and HIV-related restrictions on entry, stay and residence: HIV testing required for study permit
